hero.heroTitle: The first comprehensive Saudi delivery services app
hero.heroSubtitle1: Errands, food, packages, and market delivery... all in one app.

Links.title: Connect with Bjeek
Links.subtitle: Find all our important links, social media, and resources in one place

services.servicesTitle: How many apps do you need to deliver an order?
services.subtitle: The market is full of scattered applications... Bjeek brings all delivery services together in one platform, with an easy and fast experience that meets the needs of the Saudi market.

ride.title: Rides (Bjeek Ride)
ride.bullet1: Service providing safe and reliable transportation.
ride.bullet2: Multiple vehicle options to suit all needs and budgets.
ride.bullet3: Advanced tracking system allowing customers to follow their trip in real-time.
ride.bullet4: Driver rating feature to ensure service quality.

food.title: Food (Bjeek Food)
food.bullet1: Partnership with local and international restaurants.
food.bullet2: User-friendly interface for browsing menus and customizing orders.
food.bullet3: Multiple and flexible payment options for all customers.
food.bullet4: Real-time order tracking from order placement to delivery.

express.title: Orders (Bjeek Express)
express.bullet1: Provides comprehensive delivery service for markets and other purchases.
express.bullet2: Ability to order anything from anywhere in the city.
express.bullet3: Personal shopping service on behalf of the customer.
express.bullet4: Direct communication option with the representative to ensure order accuracy.

logistics.title: Mail (Bjeek Logistics)
logistics.bullet1: Diverse delivery options suitable for different mail sizes and delivery priorities.
logistics.bullet2: Customers can track their packages step by step from pickup to final delivery, with regular notifications and updates.
logistics.bullet3: We are committed to ensuring mail safety through secure packaging and careful handling.
logistics.bullet4: Insurance options available for complete peace of mind.
